definition[0]: a set of papers containing detailed, usually secret information about a person or subject
example[0]: A firm of detectives produced a dossier on his activities.
definition[1]: a collection of written papers which contain detailed information about a particular subject or person
example[1]: She had a dossier of complaints about her neighbours.
example[2]: They prepared a 20-page dossier detailing reasons why the new road was needed.
example[3]: The FBI have kept a dossier on him since his radical student days.
